title: Audit and Tax Manager Job at Momsar Financial Consulting Services
content:
Momsar Financial Consulting services is registered with the Corporate Affairs Commission (CAC) as a Financial Consulting Firm. We aim to provide efficient and effective service delivery to our clients using cutting edge technology. We provide a variety of professional services in the areas of auditing, accounting and financial management, consulting, tax services, staff management services, financial investigation, receivership and liquidation as well as capacity building.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Audit and Tax Manager
Job Location: Abuja
Employment Type: Full-time

The Role
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	As an Audit and Tax Manager, you will manage multiple client engagements across industries, ensure the delivery of high-quality audit services, and provide insights that support our clients’ financial integrity and strategic decisions.
	This is a client-facing role requiring strong technical knowledge, leadership, and business acumen.


Key Responsibilities


	Plan, manage, and deliver external audit engagements for a range of clients, from SMEs to large corporations.
	Supervise, mentor, and develop a team of auditors, reviewing work for quality and compliance.
	Build and maintain strong client relationships, understanding their businesses and needs.
	Identify risk areas and provide value-added recommendations in areas of internal control and financial reporting.
	Ensure audit documentation and reporting aligns with professional standards (e.g. IFRS, GAAP, ISA).
	Collaborate with the tax and consulting teams to offer integrated service solutions.
	Monitor engagement profitability and support business development efforts where appropriate.


Qualifications


	Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field (required).
	Professional qualification: ICAN, CA, CPA, ACCA, or equivalent (required).
	5+ years of progressive external audit experience in public accounting or a consulting firm, with at least 2 years at a supervisory/managerial level.
	Experience in Nigeria FIRS compliances and laws
	Strong technical understanding of accounting and auditing standards (IFRS, local GAAP).
	Experience managing audit engagements for clients in various sectors (including financial services, manufacturing, nonprofits, etc.) is a plus.
	Excellent communication and leadership skills.
	Experience with audit and accounting software (e.g., CaseWare, QuickBooks, or similar).


What We Offer


	Competitive compensation and performance-based bonuses
	Professional development support
	A collaborative, client-focused culture with room for growth
	Exposure to a variety of industries and complex client challenges


Application Closing Date
20th June, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a Cover Letter (only in PDF) to: mmc.hr.recruits@gmail.com using "Audit Manager Application" as the subject of the email.

title: Operations Manager Job at the Vault Recruitment (TVR)
content:
The Vault Recruitment (TVR) is a fast growing recruitment firm specializing in connecting top talent with SME's and Startup organizations. Our team of experienced recruiters understands the unique needs and challenges of the modern job market and uses our extensive network and industry knowledge to find the best candidates for our clients.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Operations Manager

Vacancy Code: RUNS001
Job Location: Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Description
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	A growing logistics startup, is seeking a Operations Manager to lead strategy, drive revenue growth, and oversee smooth logistics execution across departments. If you are a goal-oriented leader who thrives in fast-paced environments, this is for you.


Qualifications


	Education: BSc or HND
	Minimum of 3 years in operations, with at least 2 in a leadership role
	Strong communication, project management, and team leadership skills
	Previous experience in a startup or fast-growing organization
	Knowledge of logistics, FMCG, or delivery operations
	Ability to manage resources, deadlines, and teams under pressure
	Strong problem-solving and people management capabilities
	Must be highly proactive and results-driven.

title: Front Desk Officer Job at Express Resource Connect
content:
Express Resource Connect was launched in 2020 as a response to developing a home grown business management solution simplified enough to be used by an owner manager of any business or an enterprise with multiple business processes and employees. We offer a comprehensive business management solution, empowering smal, mid-size, and large enterprises to automate, digitise, and seamlessly manage al their business operations in one integrated platform.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Front Desk Officer
Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a professional and courteous Front Desk Officer to serve as the first point of contact for guests.
	The ideal candidate (male preferred for operational balance) will be responsible for providing exceptional customer service, handling guest check-ins and check-outs, and managing front desk operations efficiently and professionally.


Key Responsibilities


	Greet and welcome guests promptly with a warm and friendly attitude.
	Manage check-in and check-out procedures smoothly and accurately.
	Coordinate with housekeeping and other departments to ensure guest satisfaction.
	Ensure the lobby and reception area remain tidy and presentable.
	Answer and direct phone calls, respond to inquiries, and take messages.
	Handle guest complaints and requests with professionalism and escalate when necessary.
	Maintain accurate guest records and process payments efficiently.
	Monitor guest reservations and room availability using the hotel booking system.
	Assist in administrative tasks and hotel security procedures when required.


Requirements


	Prior experience in a hotel or customer service role is an added advantage.
	Male (preferred)
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
	Strong attention to detail and organizational abilities.
	Must be well-groomed, courteous, and professional in appearance.
	Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite and hotel management software.
	Must be able to work on weekends, holidays, and in shifts.


Salary
N80,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@express-resource.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
